resources.string: It\'s the middle of the day.

FILLER SPACE. IGNORE. 



 This is Kinley! She is a sweet little girl who loves to play in the mud/water and anything that gets her dirty. 
 
She likes to gives lots of hugs and kisses, play with her 3-legged bro Wylee, and bark at airplanes and such because she is weird. 
 
 She is such a beautiful and intelligent girl, and the perfect companion for Wylee as he advances in age and becomes a grumpy old dog.
